 2015-02042015-02-19EC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending THE METAL MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to allow Detour Gold Corporation to utilize four natural, fish-frequented water bodies for disposal of waste rock and tailings from the Detour Lake Gold Mine in Ontario.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0045 Publication Date: 2015-03-11
